Articles.Content:
A slightly larger ship then I prefer, but was part of my testing when figuring out how boosters work.

20 Main engines.....

54 Fuel tanks....

Daisychain fuel system....

Will fly straight up to over 2.6 million meters in 21 minutes before running out of fuel....

Handles.......Badly.

All Stock parts.....

Could probably be made to fly higher, but I thought it flew quite far enough and decided to learn how to orbit instead of just flying directly to the Mun.

Watch your first 3 booster pairs, they don\'t last long.....
